metadata.name: Potential Persistence Via PowerShell User Profile Using Add-Content
metadata.comment: Detects calls to "Add-Content" cmdlet in order to modify the content of the user profile and potentially adding suspicious commands for persistence

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('add-content $profile')) AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-value "iex ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-value "invoke-expression')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-value "invoke-webrequest')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-value "start-process')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-value \'iex ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-value \'invoke-expression')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-value \'invoke-webrequest')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-value \'start-process'))))

output.summary: Detects calls to "Add-Content" cmdlet in order to modify the content of the user profile and potentially adding suspicious commands for persistence

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administration and tuning scripts that aim to add functionality to a user PowerShell session Reference: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1546.013/T1546.013.md
